sourcesContent:
function WorkStat(props){ const status=props.stat.title.toLowerCase().split(" ").length === 2 ? props.stat.title.toLowerCase().split(" ").join("-") : props.stat.title.toLowerCase() console.log(status) return

{props.stat.title}

{props.stat.current}Hrs

Last week {props.stat.previous}Hrs

} export default WorkStat
